scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy --config iac/resources/acm.serverless.yml && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy
scripts.deploy:uat: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy --config iac/resources/acm.serverless.yml && cross-env NODE_ENV=uat sls deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls deploy --config iac/resources/acm.serverless.yml && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod sls deploy
scripts.destroy:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev sls remove
scripts.destroy:uat: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=uat sls remove
scripts.destroy:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod sls remove
scripts.start-sls: npm run build && sls offline start
